column4: Entering the Battlefield – QMS Basics & SOP Gap Review
column6: Hospital QA Task — Sterilization SOP Compliance & CAPA Initiation
column7: You are a QA fresher assigned to audit the surgical instrument sterilization process at Sanjeevani Hospital. During the audit you discover that the sterilization logs for the past week are missing daily disinfectant concentration check records. This is a direct violation of the hospital's SOP. Your task is to review the sterilization SOP and logs identify non-compliance issues draft a CAPA report and suggest a monitoring plan.

column4: Entering the Battlefield – QMS Basics & SOP Gap Review
column6: Pharma QA Task — SOP Gap Review & Batch Record Verification
column7: You are a junior QA officer at HealWell Pharmaceuticals responsible for batch release verification. During your review of the batch production record for HealWell Pain Relief Tablets you find that the cleaning checklist for the production equipment is missing signatures on two critical cleaning steps. Your task is to review the SOP and batch record identify deviations draft a non-conformance report and propose improvements.
A new patient has arrived for registration. Walk through the complete registration process while ensuring all required documentation is collected and processed correctly.
You need to verify a patient's insurance coverage before a scheduled procedure. Follow the verification process and identify any potential issues or requirements.
You are part of a team developing a new clinical research protocol. Review the requirements and create a structured protocol document following industry standards.
Prepare and submit a research protocol to the Institutional Review Board (IRB). Ensure all ethical considerations and regulatory requirements are addressed.
Set up a clinical data collection system for a new study. Define data points, validation rules, and quality control measures.
Review clinical trial data for accuracy and completeness. Identify discrepancies and implement corrective actions following GCP guidelines.
